tasks.title: Remove keyboard shortcuts from company detail view
tasks.description: The company-detail-view.tsx has keyboard shortcuts (j/k for navigation, Escape to go back) implemented via a useEffect with keydown listener. These shortcuts should be removed to simplify the component and remove the keyboard navigation feature.
acceptance: The useEffect that adds the keydown event listener is removed from company-detail-view.tsx
The flashButton helper function is removed
The button refs (backButtonRef, prevButtonRef, nextButtonRef) are removed since they're only used for the keyboard shortcut visual feedback
Navigation still works via clicking the buttons
bun run check-types passes at the root level
